text: @maddow Black people are paying for having watched scum like you.Surgeon Gen. Jerome Adams calls on communities of color to adhere to #coronavirus advice from Trump’s task force:“If not for yourself, Do it for your grand daddy. Do it for your big mama. Do it for your pop-pop.”
